Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia Phillies host the Chicago Cubs aiming to continue a three-game home winning streak.
Philadelphia is 93-64 overall and 53-26 in home games.
The Phillies have a 68-24 record in games when they record at least eight hits.
Chicago has a 38-41 record on the road and an 80-77 record overall.
The Cubs have the ninth-ranked team slugging percentage in the NL at.396.
The teams play Tuesday for the fifth time this season. The Phillies lead the season series 3-1.
